case_title: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. BOOKER
case_info_full_case_name: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v. BOOKER

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(iii) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE 5 GRAMS OR MORE OF A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF COCAINE BASE, IN THE FORM COMMONLY KNOWN AS CRACK(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant was sentenced to 60 months imprisonment at Count One of the Indictment and 60 months imprisonment at Count Two, to run consecutively, for a total term of 120 months imprisonment. Upon release from imprisonment, defendant shall be placed on supervised release for 5 years at Count One of the Indictment and 3 years at Count Two, to run concurrently, for a total term of 5 years supervised release. No fine. Defendant was ordered to pay a special assessment of $200.

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1)(A)(i) CARRYING A FIREARM DURING AND IN RELATION TO A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME, AND POSSESSION OF SAID FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF SAID DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant was sentenced to 60 months imprisonment at Count One of the Indictment and 60 months imprisonment at Count Two, to run consecutively, for a total term of 120 months imprisonment. Upon release from imprisonment, defendant shall be placed on supervised release for 5 years at Count One of the Indictment and 3 years at Count Two, to run concurrently, for a total term of 5 years supervised release. No fine. Defendant was ordered to pay a special assessment of $200.
